body: Humans have great intuition for hidden potential. They gain a +2 racial bonus on Sense Motive checks. In addition, when they acquire an animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar, that creature gains a +2 bonus to one ability score of the character's choice. This racial trait replaces the bonus feat trait.
name: Eye for Talent
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Eye for Talent
